views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 7 - 12+

Look no further for a source of mindfulness and improved well-being; Chirp is here to display a wholesome reminder from a database of thousands directly in the Dashboard!

These reminders are sourced from, and a new one is displayed after an interval controlled by you from Settings.

On devices that do not support all emojis, take note that unknown ones will display as a �.

Configure options from Settings.

0.0.2 → 1.0 - Now compatible with iOS 7 - 12 - No longer requires internet access - No longer requires Twitter - Message refresh rate can be chose in Settings > Chirp 0.0.1 -> 0.0.2

Always visible
Additional button added to preferences, for that extra dash of wholesomeness
Optimized
